name: Nightshift Survival
description:
SURVIVE ‘TILL DAWN

When kids enter this mysterious amusement park at midnight, there’s only one way: Survive.

Nightshift Survival is a challenging rogue-lite game where you will encounter hordes of scary and dangerous creatures living in Millennium Park. Which other mysteries this place hides?

Face enemies with different movement patterns, collect and upgrade your items to survive and unlock achievements with new items and ways of playing.

  • 35 different items: 15 weapons and 15 trinkets to build your strategy + 5 powerups;
  • 7 scary enemies;
  • 30 achievements to unlock new possibilities;
  • Play multiple times to combine your favorite items and knock down the enemies;
  • New content coming soon
  • Secrets to be revealed...

Survive the nightshift, if you can.
